data.name: AboutCatalogDescription_0
data.value:
What is "Catalog Yottos"?

"Catalog Yottos" is a catalog of Internet sites. Sites in the catalog are divided by thematic categories so that search of a necessary site was as much as possible simple. Sites are placed in decreasing order their popularity among Yottos users.

What for "Catalog Yottos" is necessary?

If The site of certain subjects there is no necessity to search for it is necessary for you, using search engines and rummaging set of poor-quality sites. Simply enough to come into "Catalog Yottos" catalog.yottos.com address and, having chosen the necessary category to receive the list of the best sites.

Than "Catalog Yottos" is better than other Internet catalogues?

"Catalog Yottos" is moderable catalog. It means, that sites are added not automatically, but pass check. Yottos editors select the most qualitative resources, describe them and systematise on thematic categories. The poor-quality site simply will not get to the catalog. Resources are regularly checked on availability and removed from publication if the are does not operate anymore. Sites which are not updated more half a year, are excluded from the catalog too. Differently, in "Catalog Yottos" there are only the most qualitative and constantly updated sites.

The quantity of sites steadily grows in the catalog and makes already some thousand. If you have a site and you consider, that it is worthy to be published in Catalog Yottos,

data.name: AboutCatalogDescription_1
data.value: If you have questions or offers under the maintenance and the form of representation of the information,

data.name: AboutCatalogDescription_2
data.value: The administration will be grateful for any comments and recommendations rather Yottos.

data.name: CatalogAddAboutDescr
data.value:
In the description it is forbidden to use adjectives in a superlative degree (for example, "most", "best", "most", etc.). It is forbidden to place all text in the top register.
No more than 1000 symbols

data.name: CatalogAddAutoCustom
data.value: Wrong security code from automatic registrations specified!

data.name: CatalogAddNameDescr
data.value:
The name should characterise a resource as a whole, instead of separate sections. It is forbidden to place all text in the top register.
No more than 100 symbols.

data.name: CatalogAddSecretWord
data.value: Enter number, displayed on the picture, and click button 'Add site'

data.name: CatalogAddTitle
data.value: Your site will be published in Catalog, if:

data.name: CatalogAddTitleDescr_0
data.value:
• It's maintenance does not contradict the legislation (does not propagandise violence, racial hatred, a pornography, corruption and so forth);
  • the site or its basic sections are not in development;
  • The site subjects answer the declared heading;
  • Your site is not a mirror of other site.

data.name: CatalogAddTitleDescr_1
data.value:
Yottos reserves the right to itself to reject inquiry about site registration in the catalog without explanations.

All fields are obligatory to filling!
